item.title: Upload-AircraftDesignators.ps1
item.description: This script is used to ingest aircraft type designator data from a public CSV file into a local API database. The CSV file is auto-generated weekly by a GitHub Action that scrapes Wikipediaâ€™s aircraft type designators and saves a clean version to the repository.
